title: [Large-Scale] Debunking the Learning Styles Myth: Designing Effective Mathematics Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematical concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Large-scale mathematics education course in simulation/VR environments for in-service professionals, requiring practical setups utilizing learners' personal BYOD environments

learning_goals: The scientific basis of learning style myths can be critically analyzed and their impacts on educational settings explained
When designing math lessons integrating diverse teaching methods, a decision-making framework considering educational priorities can be applied
Problem-solving projects utilizing multisensory elements can be collaboratively performed in VR simulation environments

resources: Learning style diagnostic tool (for critical analysis)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
